text: Shocking report on America's healthcare affordability crisis! 😱💸🏥 Did you know that many Americans can only afford $97 per month for out-of-pocket medical costs? 🤯 Preventive visits, prescription drugs, mental health care, and diagnostic testing are being skipped or delayed due to unaffordability! 🙅‍♂️ It's time for change! 💪 PayZen is leading the way with AI-powered solutions to tackle healthcare affordability issues and improve patient satisfaction & financial outcomes for providers. 🌟
